## LessThan class

Filters is a key component when communicating with a backend. The LessThan filter resembles the &lt; and &lt;<!-- -->= operator in SQL.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class LessThan implements Filter 
```
**Implements:** [Filter](./forms42core.filter.md)
